class_notes: This section is for InEmory MN semester 3 students only. Clinical will be Mon, Wed, Thurs or Sat 7a-7p.
course_description: This practicum course focuses on the application of public health principles to nursing care of the community/population of focus. Students will apply principles of public health and the socioecological framework into the role of advanced generalists to optimize health for specific populations.
